statements: SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies
SELECT Name, SpeciesType FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE ID = 1
SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE Origin = 'Asia'
SELECT Name, ImpactOnEcosystem FROM InvasiveSpecies ORDER BY Name DESC
SELECT SpeciesType, ImpactOnEcosystem FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE Origin = 'Europe'
SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE SpeciesType = 'Plant' ORDER BY Name ASC
SELECT ID, Name, SpeciesType FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE Origin = 'Asia' ORDER BY ID DESC
SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE ImpactOnEcosystem LIKE '%severe%' OR ImpactOnEcosystem LIKE '%devastating%'
SELECT Name, Origin FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE SpeciesType = 'Animal' ORDER BY Name ASC, Origin DESC
SELECT ID, Name, SpeciesType, ImpactOnEcosystem FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE ImpactOnEcosystem IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM invasive_species ORDER BY species_id DESC;
SELECT name, scientific_name FROM invasive_species WHERE invasive_since >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM invasive_species WHERE name LIKE '%snake%';
SELECT species_id, scientific_name FROM invasive_species ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_impact WHERE impact_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM invasive_species WHERE name='Asian Carp';
SELECT * FROM invasive_species WHERE invasive_since<'2020-01-01';
SELECT species_id, name FROM invasive_species WHERE scientific_name LIKE 'Amb%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM invasive_species WHERE invasive_since BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2015-12-31';
SELECT name, invasive_since FROM invasive_species ORDER BY invasive_since ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies;
SELECT species_name, impact_description FROM InvasiveSpecies ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT ecosystem_name, location FROM Ecosystems WHERE location LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT species_name, population FROM InvasiveSpecies JOIN SpeciesEcosystem ON InvasiveSpecies.species_id = SpeciesEcosystem.species_id;
SELECT DISTINCT ecosystem_name FROM Ecosystems ORDER BY ecosystem_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies;
SELECT species_name, impact_description FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT ecosystem_name, location FROM Ecosystems ORDER BY ecosystem_name DESC;
SELECT species_id, ecosystem_id, population FROM SpeciesEcosystem WHERE ecosystem_id = 3;

SELECT species_name, impact_description, ecosystem_name FROM InvasiveSpecies JOIN SpeciesEcosystem ON InvasiveSpecies.species_id = SpeciesEcosystem.species_id JOIN Ecosystems ON SpeciesEcosystem.ecosystem_id = Ecosystems.ecosystem_id;
SELECT * FROM invasive_species;
SELECT name, scientific_name FROM invasive_species WHERE origin='Asia';
SELECT id, name, impact_on_ecosystem FROM invasive_species ORDER BY impact_on_ecosystem DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems WHERE location='Tropical';
SELECT id, species_id, population_size FROM species_population WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT name, description FROM ecosystems WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, scientific_name FROM invasive_species WHERE origin = 'Asia' ORDER BY scientific_name ASC;
SELECT id, name, impact_on_ecosystem FROM invasive_species WHERE impact_on_ecosystem LIKE '%negative%';
SELECT * FROM species_population WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY last_recorded_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM invasive_species;
SELECT species_name, impact_description FROM invasive_species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT ecosystem_name, location FROM ecosystems WHERE ecosystem_id = 3;
SELECT sighting_date, species_id, ecosystem_id FROM sightings WHERE ecosystem_id = 2 ORDER BY sighting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM invasive_species WHERE species_name = 'Asian Carp';
SELECT species_name, impact_description FROM invasive_species WHERE impact_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT ecosystems.ecosystem_name, sightings.sighting_date FROM ecosystems INNER JOIN sightings ON ecosystems.ecosystem_id = sightings.ecosystem_id WHERE sightings.species_id = 1;

SELECT research_studies.study_name, research_studies.researcher_name, sightings.sighting_date FROM research_studies LEFT JOIN sightings ON research_studies.study_id = sightings.sighting_id WHERE research_studies.findings LIKE '%habitat degradation%';

SELECT DISTINCT species_name AS species, ecosystem_name AS habitat FROM invasive_species INNER JOIN species_ecosystems ON invasive_species.species_id = species_ecosystems.species_id INNER JOIN ecosystems ON species_ecosystems.ecosystem_id = ecosystems.ecosystem_id;
